Project repair operation is executed in the following context:
#Menu command Project>Repair
#Menu command Project>Visit - Code Co-op performs project verification and if [[VerificationReport|project verification]] detects missing files then [[RepairDuringVisit|project repair]] is executed.
#Menu command Project>Branch
#Menu command Accept Join Request
#Menu command Project>Invite
#Menu command Tools>Restore from backup 

Project repair operation is carried out by the objects of the class ProjectChecker.

* [[ProjectChecker.Verify|Project verification]]
* [[ProjectChecker.Repair|Project repair]]
